name: Clearfix
description: The clearfix hack is a popular way to contain floats without resorting to using presentational markup.

name: Normalize.css
description: Normalize.css is a customisable CSS file that makes browsers render all elements more consistently and in line with modern standards.

name: OL, UL reset
description: This will reset the ul, ol, elements inside of a container in case a css reset was applied on the site.

name: Detect flash
description: It will detect if flash is enabled in the browser

name: Get css styles
description: Get the css styles for an element that are not depended on the style attribute.

name: Get ViewPort Size
description: This snippet will get the viewport size including scrollbars.

name: Fix Responsive Grid Height
description: Small function that will maintain the equal height between responsive grid elements.

name: RespondJS
description: A fast & lightweight polyfill for min/max-width CSS3 Media Queries (for IE 6-8, and more)
